FilterItemPortable.Name: (Por origem) Contratos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="ORIGEM"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>3</Value> <Text>Contratos</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>6</Value> <Text>Temporária</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: (Por origem) Cotações
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="ORIGEM"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Cotações</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>6</Value> <Text>Temporária</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: (Por origem) Licitações
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="ORIGEM"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>4</Value> <Text>Licitações</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>6</Value> <Text>Temporária</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: (Por origem) Manual
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="ORIGEM"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>2</Value> <Text>Manual</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>6</Value> <Text>Temporária</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Cadastradas
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">((A.LIBERADA <> 'S' OR A.LIBERADA IS NULL) AND (A.STATUS = 1 OR A.STATUS = 7) AND (A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO OR (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VSUALIZAR_OREDENSDECOMPRA_TODOSUSUARIOS') IN @TAREFAS) )</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>((A.LIBERADA <> 'S' OR A.LIBERADA IS NULL) AND (A.STATUS = 1 OR A.STATUS = 7) AND (A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO OR (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VSUALIZAR_OREDENSDECOMPRA_TODOSUSUARIOS') IN @TAREFAS) )</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Confirmar
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">( A.LIBERADA = 'S' OR A.LIBERADA IS NULL ) AND ( A.STATUS IN(1, 7) ) AND ( ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO ) OR (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VSUALIZAR_OREDENSDECOMPRA_TODOSUSUARIOS') IN @TAREFAS OR ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ( ( C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S' ) ) OR ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ( ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S' ) ) )</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>( A.LIBERADA = 'S' OR A.LIBERADA IS NULL ) AND ( A.STATUS IN(1, 7) ) AND ( ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO ) OR (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VSUALIZAR_OREDENSDECOMPRA_TODOSUSUARIOS') IN @TAREFAS OR ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ( ( C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S' ) ) OR ( A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ( ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S' ) ) )</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
